Title: Episode 7
Plot: Sue does some detecting; Martin comes into some money; Statham and Joanna try to keep the incident with the stuffed heron secret; Caroline has to be cruel to be kind.
ParentalRatingReason: Offensive language, sexual material and other content that may offend
Writer: Fay Rusling, Gary Howe, James Henry, Oriane Messina
GuestStars: Darren Boyd, Paterson Joseph, Matthew Steer, Fay Rusling, Jonah Russell, Preeya Kalidas, Simon Nagra, Keir Charles, Sarah Hadland, Sally Phillips
